title: Gordon Brown – 2022 Comments on Afghan Girls Attending School
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Gordon Brown, the former Labour Prime Minister, on Twitter on 22 November 2022.
content: All who are travelling to the World Cup in Qatar should come together to protest the Taliban’s ban on Afghan girls attending school. The Muslim world outside Afghanistan welcomes and encourages girls education. By coming together, we can change millions of lives for the better.
